DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether Intrapulmonary Percussive Ventilation ( airway clearance technique) provokes or aggravates gastro-oesophageal reflux in infants from 0 to 12 months.
DOC.brief_title: Influence of IPV on GOR in Infants From 0 to 12 Months.
DOC.criteria: infants from 0 to 12 months impedance monitoring gestational age < 24w antireflux medication Nissen fundoplication no parental consent
